description: An ancient settlement in the southern part of the island of Cyprus, located southwest of Episkopi in the Lemesos district.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: SW Episkopi (Lemesos district)

names.description: Name of Kourion in seventh-century-BC Neo-Assyrian inscriptions (reigns of Esarhaddon and Ashurbanipal).
